Professional Experience

Software Development and Machine Learning Co-op September 2020 - Present
BC Cancer Agency, Vancouver, BC
Ovarian Cancer Research Program (OVCARE)
  • Full stack development of a tissue slide image annotation application to provide diagnostic support for histologists
  • Implemented a heatmap feature to display regions of interest of tissue slide images as identified by deep learning models
  • Responsible for the installation and configuration of a self-hosted WordPress site using a Linux, Nginx, MySQL, and PHP (LEMP) stack
  • Automated a weekly backup of annotation files to on- and off-premise servers using cron and Bash
  • Analyzed latest deep learning and cancer research as a member of the lab’s weekly journal club
Software Development Co-op May 2019 - August 2019, May 2018 - August 2018
Arcurve, Calgary, AB
  • Developed a .NET Core web application to compile personal financial data into a concise analysis report which facilitated investment advisory
  • Identified significant performance enhancement opportunities in the search functionality of a compliance management platform using Apache JMeter
  • Protected against regression defects by updating unit test suites using tools such as Jest and MSTest
  • Raised $1000 for the Calgary Food Bank and hosted a free coding workshop for youth through intern-led corporate social responsibility initiatives
  • Contributed to agile development through daily stand-up meetings, frequent releases, and bi-weekly sprint planning
Information Technology Co-op May 2017 - July 2017
Crew Energy Inc., Calgary, AB
  • Designed and developed an inventory dashboard using VBA and PowerPivot to streamline access to production data
  • Prevented potential security breaches by overseeing the maintenance and security updates of over 80 office computers
  • Responded to remote and in-person service desk requests with professionalism
  • Liaised with software vendors to monitor bug fixes and new releases

Projects

Salmon Otolith Analyzer August 2020 - November 2020
Python, R
Determines the ratio of vaterite to aragonite in salmon otolith microscope images and generates a report detailing the dimensions, area, and perimeter of the structure. Created for the Juanes Lab at the University of Victoria.
Video Compressor and Decompressor August 2020
C++
Uses techniques including the discrete cosine transform, quantization, predicted frames, and motion vectors to achieve real-time compression on a video stream. Allows the user to specify the quality of the decompressed stream.
Movie Review Classifier February 2020
Python
Contrasts exact inference algorithms to construct a Naïve Bayes classifier which categorizes movie reviews as positive or negative.
Unix Command Line Interface January 2020
C
Interprets lines from the terminal and parses the input to execute built-in commands (change directory, print working directory, help) and application files.

Innovative Communities, Victoria, BC
